channel.title: Neil Kring on First Baptist Church Muncie
channel.description: Recent content in Neil Kring on First Baptist Church Muncie

item.title: The Essence of the Church
item.description: Building, Community, and Presence are rooted in the present (the needs of our community and places where we see God working), in the past (history and tradition), and in the future (imagining life under the rule of Jesus the King).

item.title: The Church as Godâ€™s Vehicle for Mission
item.description: On Labor Day weekend, Neil Kring spoke from Peter 2:4-5; 9-10.

item.title: Jonah
item.description: On July 5, we will gather in a combined worship service with two local churches.
